title: Understanding Anorexia Nervosa
text: Anorexia nervosa is a serious mental health condition that affects eating behaviors and perceptions of body image.

title: Key Characteristics of Anorexia Nervosa
text: Individuals with anorexia nervosa often have an intense fear of gaining weight and a distorted body image, leading to severe food restriction.

hintAnswer: $$self-induced$$ restriction of food, due to fear of weight gain, that results in weight lowering to below the normal parameters for age and height
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes anorexia nervosa?
choices: an illness where there is an abnormal disturbance in attitudes and behaviors related to food
displeasure with body image and behavioral rigidity, meaning that the person may have habits that are $$inflexible$$, compulsive, and resistive to change
$$self-induced$$ restriction of food, due to fear of weight gain, that results in weight lowering to below the normal parameters for age and height
